about_the_game:
Welcome to the Backrooms—where reality ends, and terror begins.

In this survival-horror experience, you’re trapped in the unsettling liminal spaces of the Backrooms, armed with only your bodycam and your wits. Explore a procedurally shifting maze of endless halls, decaying rooms, and dark corridors, each more unsettling than the last. But beware—something is always watching.

Survival Is Key:
Manage your resources carefully. Batteries, food, and sanity are finite, and the creatures lurking in the shadows are anything but forgiving. Every step brings you closer to escape—or an untimely end.

Solve, Gather, Craft:
The Backrooms aren’t just about survival. Solve intricate puzzles to unlock new areas, gather mysterious artifacts, and craft tools to fend off danger or open hidden pathways. Your ability to adapt is your only chance.

Dynamic Horror:
Experience a world that shifts and twists around you, where nothing stays the same for long. Walls move, rooms disappear, and every sound could mean the arrival of an unspeakable entity.

XP and Progression:
Earn experience for solving puzzles, avoiding enemies, and surviving the terrors of the Backrooms. Use your XP to unlock upgrades, new tools, and abilities to improve your chances in this nightmarish labyrinth.

Will You Escape?
Every choice you make has consequences. Will you risk everything for a clue to the exit, or will you play it safe and survive another day? The Backrooms remember. The Backrooms evolve. And they’re always waiting.

Key Features:

  • Immersive Bodycam Gameplay: A unique, found-footage perspective heightens tension and realism.

  • Story-Driven Puzzles: Unravel the mystery of the Backrooms through cryptic recordings, notes, and environmental storytelling.

  • Terrifying AI Entities: Adapt your strategy to outsmart relentless, procedurally driven foes.

  • Crafting and Customization: Create tools and upgrade equipment to survive longer and delve deeper.

  • Procedurally Generated Levels: No two runs are ever the same.

Do you have what it takes to survive the Backrooms? The only way out is through.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300 or equivalent
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher 64bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600x or Intel equivalent
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Survive relentless entities, solve mind-bending puzzles, and uncover the dark secrets of your surroundings. With an XP system, crafting, and resource management, every decision matters. Will you find your way out—or become another lost soul?
